mapper.sql: SGT.GOOD_TRANSACTION_ID, SGT.GOOD_ID, SGT.MEMBER_ID, SGT.GOOD_TRANSACTION_DATE, SGT.STATE, SG.GOOD_NAME
mapper.select:
select
from SUN_GOOD_TRANSACTION SGT left join SUN_GOOD SG on SGT.GOOD_ID = SG.GOOD_ID where SGT.GOOD_TRANSACTION_ID = #{goodTransactionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into SUN_GOOD_TRANSACTION
GOOD_ID,
MEMBER_ID,
GOOD_TRANSACTION_DATE,
STATE,
#{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodTransactionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update SUN_GOOD_TRANSACTION
GOOD_ID = #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOOD_TRANSACTION_DATE = #{goodTransactionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where GOOD_TRANSACTION_ID = #{goodTransactionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
